title: Loving Lily
description: The final installment of Drake and Lily's story. After reuniting with Lily, I had no doubt in my mind that she was the one for me. But like all marriages everyone gets tested. Add a dozen more problems coming from all directions—it could get extremely tricky. Does a man really have a limit when it came to the woman he vowed to love for the rest of his life? There was one thing I learned—that marriage was sacred…a sacred test. A test of will. A test of time.
author: Pamela Ann
